column3: Good <If(LessThan(PlayerParameter(11),12))><If(LessThan(PlayerParameter(11),4))>eve<Else/>morrow</If><Else/><If(LessThan(PlayerParameter(11),17))>day<Else/>eve</If></If> to you, adventurer, and may the flowers of love ever blossom in your heart! If you should desire to learn more of the Valentione's Day festivities, please do not hesitate to ask. I shall be only too eager to share with you everything I know.

The very question we seek to address! For why do so many hearts across this fair realm torment themselves with unspoken ardors? Do they fear the pain that might come with rejection? It is a pity indeed, to think that fear might cause some to miss the unbridled joy that comes with reciprocation.

Thus do we of the proud Ishgardian house of Valentione come to Eorzea this day, in the hope that we may give courage─a slight push forwards, if you will─to those who find themselves too shy to approach the object of their affection.
During our time here, we hope to pass on a timeless house tradition to the denizens of Eorzea. If you wish to learn more, pray seek out our Lady Lisette and Ser Hortefense.

And so it is that we have journeyed here, in the hope of passing on a timeless house tradition to the denizens of Eorzea. If you wish to learn more, our Lady Lisette and Ser Hortefense can be found in Gridania.

It is a time of celebration, when we honor the life of Countess Arabelle de Valentione: a high lady of Ishgard, who struck out against her life of cosseted detachment, and risked all in pursuit of a pure and all-consuming love.

In the years after the countess's passing, a tradition became established among the Ishgardian populace: every year at this time would they strive to emulate her passion and her bravery, by plucking up their own courage and bestowing a token of love upon the object of their affections.

Lady Lisette is a direct descendant of Countess Arabelle de Valentione, and her very image, both in beauty and in spirit. Whether it is by her tireless exhortations or simply by her captivating presence, there is none who stokes the fires of passion in Eorzean hearts more than she.

Men want her, and women want to <Emphasis>be</Emphasis> her. And many the other way around. But how can my words do justice to such a light as hers? If you wish to learn more of my lady, pray speak with her yourself. She is ever eager to meet new faces...provided they are willing to submit to her command.

Men want her, and women want to <Emphasis>be</Emphasis> her. And many the other way around. But how can my words do justice to such a light as hers? If you wish to learn more of my lady, pray seek her out in Gridania, where she is overseeing the festivities. She is ever eager to meet new faces...provided they are willing to submit to her command.
